title: Coronation Street spoilers: Shona devastated as Gail cancels the wedding
text:
It’s been a tough couple of months for Shona Ramsey (Julia Goulding) in Coronation Street, as she’s been having to look after the kids on her own what with David Platt (Jack P Shepherd) behind bars. Of course, matters were made worse when David was accused of stabbing Josh Tucker (Ryan Clayton), but will he be released in time for his wedding to Shona? That, is — if there even is a wedding left to be released for!

Shona has been holding out hope that David will be released in time for the pair’s upcoming wedding ceremony. However, the odds of such a turn of events happening became much slimmer when Josh was stabbed in prison during a riot — and David became the prime suspect in the investigation into the incident.

Shona’s adamant that her wedding will still go ahead, but Coronation Street has revealed that she’s left devastated in the coming episodes she discovers that Gail (Helen Worth) has taken it upon herself to cancel the wedding on their behalf.

Meanwhile, Nick (Ben Price) informs Imran (Charlie de Melo) of his plan to visit Josh in hospital, but — while doing so — he’ll masquerade as the young man’s solicitor. However, a suspicious Billy (Daniel Brockelbank) later cops on to his odd behaviour, and enquires what he’s up to.

Will Nick’s plan prove successful, or will Billy get in his way?

Later in the week, Shona informs Gail and Sarah that David is hopeful he’ll be released in time — which means the wedding is officially back on.

The question is: will David be released without charge regarding Josh’s stabbing? Or will he be forced to miss his big day due to the ongoing investigation?

Coronation Street continues Monday 28thNovember at 7:30pm on ITV.
